experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Set up, maintain, update, and optimize (A/B Testing) hosted sites using a LAMP Stack. Design, develop, code and test client API integrations. Contribute to agile development of project timelines, implementation design specification, system flow diagrams.

experience.title: Front End Developer

experience.title: Solutions Specialist
